summary: 1963  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: The Surfaris were an American surf rock band formed in Glendora, California in 1962. They are best known for two songs that hit the charts in the Los Angeles area, and nationally by May 1963: "Surfer Joe" and "Wipe Out", which were the A-side and B-side of a 45 rpm single.
title: The Surfaris
